A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Such a letdown. Snoke is completely wasted and Rey's lineage makes no sense given the Skywalker lightsaber called to her in the Force Awaken. Casino scene is just a waste of time and Leia Poppins is farcical. Final showdown between Kylo and Luke was laughable. This movie should have been one of the best in the saga\, instead it's one of the most disappointing
